name: murder, I wrote
description: this game is merely the base of a game I have chosen to work on. this short gameplay only displays the basic mechanics and storyline that will be in the improved game. this game was made for a college assignment which means that requirements were met that wont be followed in the improved game, e.g making all my own models, making the game PEGI 12, etc. The improved game will not only be longer but also better quality and less bugs.
